rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that greets guests with ample natural light and minimalistic design.
Modern living area with open concept adjoining the central courtyard. Designed to promote social interaction while offering Vastu-aligned seating arrangements.
Contemporary dining space integrated within the living area for a seamless flow and energy balance.
Efficient, well-lit kitchen with modern appliances and ample counter space. Features an open layout connecting to the courtyard for ventilation.
Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the central courtyard. Designed according to Vastu principles for enhanced serenity and privacy.
Secondary bedroom with sufficient natural light and ventilation, positioned in an auspicious corner of the plan.
Well-designed bathroom with modern fixtures and proper drainage. Placement ensures privacy while following Vastu guidelines for water-related spaces.
